1: %%%-------------------------------------------------------------------
    2: %%% @author cdw
    3: %%% Created 2019/03/21
    4: %%% @doc
    5: %%% @end
    6: %%%-------------------------------------------------------------------
    7: -module(mafiapp_SUITE).
    8: 
    9: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   10: 
   11: %% API
   12: -export([all/0, init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1,
   13:          init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2, add_service/1]).
   14: 
   15: all() ->
   16:     [add_service].
   17: 
   18: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   19:     Priv = ?config(priv_dir, Config),
   20:     application:set_env(mnesia, dir, Priv),
   21:     mafiapp:install([node()]),
   22:     application:start(mnesia),
   23:     application:start(mafiapp),
   24:     Config.
   25: init_per_testcase(add_service, Config) ->
   26:     Config.
   27: 
   28: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   29:     application:stop(mnesia),
   30:     ok.
   31: 
   32: end_per_testcase(_, _Config) ->
   33:     ok.
   34: 
   35: add_service(_Config) ->
   36:     {error, unknown_friend} = mafiapp:add_service("from name", "to name", {1946, 5, 23}, "a fake service"),
   37:     ok = mafiapp:add_friend("Don Corleone", [], [boss], boss),
   38:     ok = mafiapp:add_friend("Alan Parsons", [{twitter, "@ArtScienceSound"}], [{born, {1948, 12, 20}}, musician, 'audio engineer', producer, "has projects"], mixing),
   39:     ok = mafiapp:add_service("Alan Parsons", "Don Corleone", {1973, 3, 1}, "Helped release a Pink Floyd album").
